name: OhMonsea Finance Plan
description: A high-end, real-time financial planning tool with automatic balance forecasting.
changelog: Versi 2.3.0: Premium Animations & Multi-Month PDF. Penambahan sistem animasi (staggered list, bounce, tactile feedback), fitur pemilihan bulan saat cetak PDF, perbaikan tampilan anggaran mobile, dan optimasi performa ekspor laporan.

versionHistory.changes: Implementasi sistem animasi premium, fitur multi-month PDF selection, dan perbaikan tampilan budget mobile.
